item.title: How do I change prices of iteams in shops?
item.dc:creator: @Halo4Ever Halo4Ever
item.description:
@Halo4Ever wrote:

The price is divided by a certain number I forget what it is though, Let me check and I’ll post it.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2007, 11:47:29 AM[/size][hr]Ok,

For example, This is what my sea turtle looks like in my item.cfg

item = 397	Sea_turtle	Tasty!	384.961576069808	384.961576069808	446.03290933615

The second number 384.961576069808 is the price which comes out to 610 gp.

So if you want to make something cost 10k

Open up caculator and type in 10000 and divide it by 1.5845737287021707255966732274276 the number you get put it in the second slot.
You mid aswell just change them all. Thats what I did.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change prices of iteams in shops?
